column2: Lowe's Cos., Inc. engages in the retail sale of home improvement products. The company is headquartered in Mooresville, North Carolina and currently employs 190,000 full-time employees. The firm operates approximately 2,370 home improvement and hardware stores. The firm offers a range of products for maintenance, repair, remodeling and decorating. The firm offers home improvement products in categories, including Lumber and Building Materials; Tools and Hardware; Appliances; Fashion Fixtures; Rough Plumbing and Electrical; Lawn and Garden; Seasonal and Outdoor Living; Paint; Flooring; Millwork, and Kitchens. The firm also supports the communities that focus on K-12 public education and community improvement projects. The firm serves its customers in the United States, Canada and Mexico.
